metadata.title: Line P : chemical data
metadata.description: Full-depth CTD and water samples from 5 stations along Line P. Additional sampling at station papa ( P26), and loop seawater samples underway. May also include other lines and other projects (Line Z, Line R, Line PE, JGOFS, WOCE, Seamounts, Alaskan Gyre, Eddy, ).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: As needed

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: These data are provided "as-is".
